bibl.title: Response.
Material Culture and Texts of Graeco-Roman Egypt: Creating Context, Debating Meaning
bibl.author: JOHNSON, Janet H.

bibl.note: Paper presented at the Joint American Institute of Archaeology and American Philological Association meeting, Boston, January 7, 2005. - Observations on the papers presented at the colloquium.
bibl.seg: Traianos GAGOS (Editor-in-Chief), Jennifer E. GATES, Andrew T. WILBURN (Guest Editors), Timothy RENNER, John WHITEHORNE (Editors), Material Culture and Texts of Graeco-Roman Egypt: Creating Context, Debating Meaning = BASP 42 (2005) Special Thematic Section, pp. 267-272.
